title: Sysdig Secure Pod Policy Advisor
description: How to successfully use Kubernetes Pod Policy Advisor and not die trying.

steps.title: Make sure your Kubernetes cluster supports PSP
Create default restrictive PSP for default service account
Enable permissive PSP and assign it to kube-system and sysdig-agent
Create a temporary permissive PSP for the new app namespace service account
Upload deployment and generate new PSP, customize it and start simulation
Deploy the application and validate the policy
Replace the permissive PSP by the validated one (and optionally redeploy)
